Package org.primaresearch.shared.variable

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DoubleValueFormatter
    Interface for formatters that convert double values to strings.
    This had to be decoupled from the default Java interface to be compatible with GWT (which comes with it's own NumberFormat for client code).
    Variable
    Interface for variables holding values.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseVariable
    Abstract base class for Variable implementations handling name, caption, description, ID, sort index, visibility and constraint.
    BooleanValue
    Value object for Variable holding a boolean.
    BooleanVariable
    Variable implementation for boolean values.
    DoubleValue
    Value object for Variable holding a double.
    DoubleVariable
    Variable implementation for double values.
    IntegerValue
    Value object for Variable holding an integer.
    IntegerVariable
    Variable implementation for integer values.
    StringValue
    Value object for Variable holding a string.
    StringVariable
    Variable implementation for string values.
    VariableComparator
    Comparator to sort variables by sort index
    VariableMap
    Indexed map of Variables.
    VariableValue
    Base class for values of the class Variable.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Variable.WrongVariableTypeException
    Exception for calls to setValue() with value object that doesn't match the variable type.
